paper_abstract: This paper briefly introduces the T-DMB standard based on Eureka-147 DAB and presents a new T-DMB transmission system, which uses a device called the Ensemble Remultiplexer, for mobile multimedia broadcasting service. And we verify the T-DMB standard by using the new transmission system with commercial equipment in the laboratory and in the field as moving on a car in high speed around urban districts surrounded by high buildings.
paper_title: Evaluation of the T-DMB standard and the transmission system by using ensemble remultiplexer
